ComicInfo.Summary:
Hairbutt the Hippo stars an anthropomorphic hippopotamus named Hairbutt, who works as a private detective. This issue tells a two-fisted tale of crime noir fiction entitled "TRUST". Brought to you by the decidedly-twisted good folks at Rat Race Comix m Bodine Amerikah and Jason Paulos. Here comes the thundering saga of a Down Under private dick who does not go gently into that good night. You know him, you love him! Yes, it's HAIRBUTT THE HIPPO, he of the nasty temperament and even nastier personal grooming habits. Like one of the covers boasts, "Uncut! Uncensored! Unashamed! Unhygenic!"
